attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cancer is expensive, SSP is not enough to live on when you are having treatments.  Family members are relied on for care at home. There is regular travelling expenses to hospital.  Family members are relied on for care at home. The stress of not being able to pay household bills is not good for the patient.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/thecword/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
